verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H7218>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and prophesy against <S%H5012>him,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1463>Behold,<s%> I am against you, Gog, <S%H7218>prince<s%> of <S%H7218>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal:<s%>

and I will turn you <S%H7725>around,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> into your <S%H3895>jaws,<s%> and I will bring you <S%H3318>forth,<s%> with all your <S%H2428>army,<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> all of them <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H4358>full<s%> <S%H7227>armor,<s%> a great <S%H6951>company<s%> with <S%H6793>buckler<s%> and <S%H4043>shield,<s%> all of them <S%H8610>handling<s%> <S%H2719>swords;<s%>
<S%H6539>Persia,<s%> <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> and <S%H6316>Put<s%> with <S%H4043>them,<s%> all of them with shield and <S%H3553>helmet;<s%>

<S%H1586>Gomer,<s%> and all his <S%H102>hordes;<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8425>Togarmah<s%> in the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and all his <S%H102>hordes;<s%> even <S%H7227>many<s%> peoples with <S%H5971>you.<s%>
Be <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> <S%H3559>yes,<s%> prepare <S%H6951>yourself,<s%> you, and all your companies who are <S%H6950>assembled<s%> to <S%H4929>you,<s%> and be a guard to them.

After <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall be <S%H6485>visited:<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> that is brought <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> that is <S%H6908>gathered<s%> out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which have been a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H2723>waste;<s%> but it is brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> all of them.

You shall <S%H5927>ascend,<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> like a <S%H7722>storm,<s%> you shall be like a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H102>you,<s%> and all your hordes, and <S%H7227>many<s%> peoples with <S%H5971>you.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> It shall happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H1697>things<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> into your <S%H3824>mind,<s%> and you shall <S%H2803>devise<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4284>device:<s%>

and you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of unwalled <S%H6519>villages;<s%> I will <S%H935>go<s%> to those who are at <S%H8252>rest,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> all of them <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> without <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and having neither <S%H1280>bars<s%> nor <S%H1817>gates;<s%>

to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey;<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the waste <S%H2723>places<s%> that are now <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are <S%H622>gathered<s%> out of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> who have <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H7075>goods,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2872>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan,<s%> and the <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> with all the young <S%H3715>lions<s%> of <S%H559>it,<s%> shall tell <S%H935>you,<s%> Have you come to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil?<s%> have you <S%H6950>assembled<s%> your <S%H6951>company<s%> to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey?<s%> to carry <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to take <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and <S%H7075>goods,<s%> to <S%H7997>take<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil?<s%>

<S%H1121>Therefore,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> In that <S%H3117>day<s%> when my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwells<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> shall you not know <S%H3045>it?<s%>

You shall <S%H935>come<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%> out of the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H7227>you,<s%> and many <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H7392>you,<s%> all of them riding on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> and a <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%>

and you shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> against my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> it shall happen in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you against my <S%H776>land,<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H6942>me,<s%> when I shall be sanctified in <S%H1463>you,<s%> Gog, before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Are you he of whom I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in <S%H6931>old<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in those <S%H3117>days<s%> for many <S%H8141>years<s%> that I would bring you against <S%H935>them?<s%>

It shall happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> that my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> into my <S%H639>nostrils.<s%>

For in my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> and in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> Surely in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>shaking<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

so that the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and all creeping <S%H7431>things<s%> who <S%H7430>creep<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and all the <S%H120>men<s%> who are on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be thrown <S%H2040>down,<s%> and the steep <S%H4095>places<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and every <S%H2346>wall<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> against him to all my <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be against his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

With <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and with <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with <S%H4305>him;<s%> and I will rain on <S%H102>him,<s%> and on his hordes, and on the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who are with <S%H7857>him,<s%> an overflowing <S%H1653>shower,<s%> and great <S%H417>hailstones,<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H1614>sulfur.<s%>

I will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> <S%H6942>myself,<s%> and sanctify <S%H3045>myself,<s%> and I will make myself known in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
